An Implementation of Decentralized Peer to Peer File Sharing

2015/17/25

Built using:  Python, Twisted framework

The purpose of this project was to implement a decentralized Peer to Peer File Sharing system using the Chord algorithm.

Authored by: G. Emanuel, T. Fraser, E. Kemp and F. Todoric

Read the paper here.
